channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024081767
item.description:
Report X-2024081767

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-20
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UPS DELIVERED A REGULATED DG PACKAGE TO ALASKA AIRLINES ON 8/19/24 FOR TRANSPORT TO NOME, ALASKA. ALASKA AIRLINES RETURNED THE PACKAGE TO UPS ON 8/20/24 BECAUSE THEY OBSERVED WETNESS ON THE BOTTOM OF THE BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS BY A UPS DESIGNATED RESPONDER DISCOVERED (3) 1 LITER BOTTLES OF ALCOHOL.(1) BOTTLE HAD LEAKED DUE TO THE CAP LOOSENING DURING TRANSIT. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED WITHOUT CUSHIONING OR CONTAINMENT MATERIALS. THE TAPE/SHRINK WRAP SEALING THE SCREW ON CAPS HAD FAILED TO KEEP ONE OF THE CAPS TIGHT IN TRANSIT.

item.title: Report I-2024080107
item.description:
Report I-2024080107

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-18
  • City: Anchorage
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Water
  • Carrier/Reporter: TOTE MARITIME ALASKA, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 18, 2024, TAG inspected trailer V 007244, booking SEA 1049003. This load sailed NB on the Midnight Sun Voyage 24129 that departed Tacoma on 8/14/2024. Upon inspecting it, TAG found undeclared hazardous items of 3 boxes of UN0012 Cartridges for Weapons, Inert Projectile and 4 boxes of UN0012 visible labeled limited quantity marked Cartridges for weapons both items are Class 1.4S explosives. There were other hazardous products in the trailer that were a Class 4.1 Flammable Solid which creates an incompatibility with the 1.4S explosives. The trailer was placarded as 4.1 and should have been placarded as Class 1.4S and segregated from the 4.1 product. Once discovered an updated Manifest was requested and trailer placarded correctly.

item.title: Report X-2024081757
item.description:
Report X-2024081757

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-29
  • City: AKN
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The runner from Silver Bay Seafoods came in with a package that was a left behind item from one of their workers. He told me the nature of good was a passport and other documents. The package didn't feel like what he stated it was, the decision was made to physical search the package. Upon searching the package found a torch lighter and a drug pipe.

item.title: Report X-2024081755
item.description:
Report X-2024081755

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-28
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024081755 Shipment was on hold due to hazmat labels that were on shipment, a DGD had not been presented. Had not been screened yet. Opened the box and performed physical search to find a can of flammable sealer. Screened the rest of the shipment and performed physical search on the other two boxes as well. Found another can of flammable sealer and two aerosols on the box with hazmat symbol on it. Undeclared hazmat found: 3 Cans of KILZ Original all Weather Sealer and Severe Stain blocker -Flammable Liquid and Vapor, 1 gallon each 2 Aerosol Cans of KILZ Upshot Interior Primer Overhead Stain Sealer - Extremely Flammable Liquid and Vapor, 10 ounces each 2. X-2024081756 Shipment was on hold due to hazmat labels that were on shipment, a DGD had not been presented. Had not been screened yet. Opened the box and performed physical search to find a can of flammable sealer. Screened the rest of the shipment and performed physical search on the other two boxes as well. Found another can of flammable sealer and two aerosols on the box with hazmat symbol on it. Undeclared hazmat found: 3 Cans of KILZ Original all Weather Sealer and Severe Stain blocker -Flammable Liquid and Vapor, 1 gallon each 2 Aerosol Cans of KILZ Upshot Interior Primer Overhead Stain Sealer - Extremely Flammable Liquid and Vapor, 10 ounces each
